/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and green accents that add a touch of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the scene. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
